author: Kometa-Team
install_msg: SponsorCheck installed. Use `[p]sponsor <github-username>` to check public current/past sponsorship of meisnate12. See also: `[p]sponsorcount`, `[p]sponsorlist`, `[p]sponsorreport`.
name: sponsorcheck
short: GitHub Sponsors utilities (public): check/list + verify against a server role.
description: Scrapes the public GitHub Sponsors page to determine if a username is a current/past public sponsor, lists visible sponsors, and verifies a guild 'Sponsor' role against the public list. Private sponsors are not visible.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any end user data.
